pageProduct.name: Oxy 5 Acne Vanishing Cream 25g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

White in colour to hide and cover pimples. It also helps clear and
control everyday pimples with a unique formulation to fight acne
bacteria.

Also contains oil-free moisturisers to help guard against
excessive dryness and is colourless and shine-free.

- Effective fast action
- Helps prevent new pimples forming

Ingredients

Contains 5% Benzoyl Peroxide

Directions

Wash affected area thoroughly with OXY Daily Face Wash and dry well. Initially apply cream to a small affected area once a day for the first two days. If no discomfort or reaction occurs, apply up to twice a day.

CAUTION: Keep away from eyes, lips, mouth and sensitive areas of the neck. If excess swelling, irritation, redness or peeling occurs, discontinue use. If these persist, consult a physician. Avoid excessive exposure to sunlight and other sources of ultraviolet (UV) light. Avoid prolonged use of this medication without consulting a physician. Avoid contact with hair or fabric as bleaching may occur.
